text: "Flesh for Fantasy" is a 1984 song by Billy Idol. It is the third single from his second studio album Rebel Yell. It went to number 29 in the United States, number 54 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in New Zealand, number 11 in Germany and Canada, number 28 in Australia, number 24 in Italy and number 20 in Switzerland. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Billy Idol songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Flesh for Fantasy
